FUNC.NAME: matrix2of5maxLength
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the matrix2of5 MaxLength property.

PARAM.NAME: matrix2of5maxLength
PARAM.DESC: Numeric value setting the maximum number of characters for the matrix2of5 structure (1 - 55).

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only matrix2of5 labels with the MaxLength property set to 30:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="matrix2of5:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="matrix2of5maxlength:30"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-matrix2of5" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-matrix2of5maxlength" Content="30"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports matrix2of5.
